author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Modify all Run3 scenarios after fixing the RPC geometry issue

#### PR validation:

The change in the xml file is being tested by the RPC group, The changes in the scenario is tested by running overlap testing tools with all modified scenarios

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Should be back ported to versions which will be used for production data/MC
title: Run3-gex164Z Modify all Run3 scenarios after fixing the RPC geometry issue
